name: Butter Croissant
description: A flaky, golden croissant with deep butter aroma and delicate layers.

name: Lemon Tart
description: Bright citrus curd in a crisp shell with a soft, toasted meringue cap.

name: Chocolate Chunk Cookie
description: Chewy center, crisp edge, and oversized chocolate chunks.

name: Vanilla Celebration Cake
description: Classic vanilla sponge layered with whipped buttercream and vanilla bean.

name: Triple Berry Muffin
description: Blueberries, raspberries, and strawberries with a light crumble top.

name: Country Sourdough
description: Naturally leavened loaf with a crisp crust and open crumb.
